title: @Riot, ETA on Amumu Pop! Vinyl in Australia?
body:
It's now been 8-ish Months since the rest of them came out and Riot assured us that we'd eventually get the Amumu Figure as well. What's going on? I have Ashe, Lee, Braim, Jinx, Vi and Thresh but still no Amumu (which also happens to be No. 1 in the series so it looks really weird not having him).

If EB Games doesn't want to stock them, could you at leash just put them on your Merch Site for a few weeks so that those of us who really want it can get it?
